Normalize weather data column names

Source: R/normalize_weather_names.R
normalize_weather_names.Rd

Ensures standardized column naming (lowercase + expected keys) for use with climecol functions such as validate_weather(), complete_daily_calendar(), summarise_gaps(), and impute_weather().

Usage

normalize_weather_names(df, station_preference = "auto")

Arguments

df

A data frame or tibble of daily weather data.

station_preference

One of "auto" (default), "Station.Name", or "Climate.ID". Controls which column becomes the canonical station.

Value

A tibble with standardized columns where present: date, tmin_c, tmax_c, tavg_c, rain_mm, precip_mm, snow_cm, and a station key (created if a reasonable source exists).
